sen.j: 九鬼 隆貞（くき たかさだ、享保14年（1729年）- 安永9年12月12日 (旧暦)（1781年1月6日））は、丹波国綾部藩の第5代藩主。
sen.e: Takasada KUKI (1729 - January 6, 1781 (December 12, 1780 in old lunar calendar)) was the fifth lord of the Ayabe Domain, Tanba Province.
Takasada KUKI (1729 - January 6, 1781 (December 12, 1780 in old lunar calendar)) was the fifth lord of the Ayabe Domain, Tanba Province.
Takasada KUKI (1729 - January 6, 1781 (December 12, 1780 in old lunar calendar)) was the fifth lord of the Ayabe Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 第4代藩主・九鬼隆寛の四男。
sen.e: He was the fourth son of Takanobu KUKI, who was the fourth lord of the domain.
He was the fourth son of Takanobu KUKI, who was the fourth lord of the domain.
He was the fourth son of Takanobu KUKI, who was the fourth lord of the domain.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Akimichi MANABE.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Akimichi MANABE.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Akimichi MANABE.

sen.j: 継室は織田信右の娘、小笠原長庸の娘。
sen.e: Second wives were a daughter of Nobusuke ODA, and a daugther of Nagatsune OGASAWARA.
Second wives were a daughter of Nobusuke ODA, and a daugther of Nagatsune OGASAWARA.
Second wives were a daughter of Nobusuke ODA, and a daugther of Nagatsune OGASAWARA.

sen.j: 子に九鬼隆郷（三男）、娘（九鬼隆棋正室）、娘（斉藤三英正室）、娘（西坊胤昌室）。
sen.e: He had a son, Takasato KUKI (the third son), and three daughters who each became a lawful wife of Takayoshi KUKI, a lawful wife of Mitsuhide SAITO, and a wife of Tanemasa NISHINOBO.
His children include Takasato KUKI (the third son), and three daughters who each became a lawful wife of Takayoshi KUKI, a lawful wife of Mitsuhide SAITO, and a wife of Tanemasa NISHINOBO.
sen.cmt: 他に子供がいるようなので表現を変更。
sen.e: His children include Takasato KUKI (the third son), and three daughters who each became a lawful wife of Takayoshi KUKI, a lawful wife of Mitsuhide SAITO, and a wife of Tanemasa NISHINOBO.

sen.j: 養子に九鬼隆晁、九鬼隆棋。
sen.e: He had 2 adopted children, Takaaki KUKI and Takayoshi KUKI.
He had two adopted children, Takaaki KUKI and Takayoshi KUKI.
He had two adopted children, Takaaki KUKI and Takayoshi KUKI.
His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
sen.cmt: 「従五位下式部少輔」と言うようにつなげて記載されることが多いようなので、つなげて「Junior Fifth-low Court Rank, Shikibu shoyu (Junior Assitant of the Ministry of Ceremonial).」としてしまってもよいと思います。
sen.e: His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
Shikibu shoyu (Junior Assitant of the Ministry of Ceremonial).
sen.cmt: 「従五位下式部少輔」と言うようにつなげて記載されることが多いようなので、つなげて「Junior Fifth-low Court Rank, Shikibu shoyu (Junior Assitant of the Ministry of Ceremonial).」としてしまってもよいと思います。
sen.e: Shikibu shoyu (Junior Assitant of the Ministry of Ceremonial).
Shikibu shoyu (Junior Assitant of the Ministry of Ceremonial).

sen.j: 長兄で嫡子だった九鬼隆恭が廃嫡されたため、宝暦2年（1752年）に世子となる。
sen.e: He became the heir in 1752 as the eldest brother and a legitimate son, Takayasu KUKI, was disinherited.
He became the heir in 1752 as the eldest brother and a legitimate son, Takayasu KUKI, was disinherited.
He became the heir in 1752 as the eldest brother and a legitimate son, Takayasu KUKI, was disinherited.

sen.j: 明和3年（1766年）、父の隠居により後を継ぐ。
sen.e: In 1766, he succeeded after his father's retirement.
In 1766, he succeeded after his father's retirement.
In 1766, he succeeded after his father's retirement.
He died in January 6, 1781.
He died in January 6, 1781.
He died in January 6, 1781.
He died at 82.
He died at the age of 52.
He died at the age of 52.

sen.j: 死去の際、隆貞には実子として三男・隆郷がいた。
sen.e: There was Takasato, the third son and his biological child, when Takasada passed away.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: There was Takasato, the third son and his biological child, when Takasada passed away.
There was Takasato, the third son and his biological child, when Takasada passed away.

sen.j: しかし、この実子は父が死んだ年に生まれたばかりだったため、後を田沼意次の三男で婿養子の隆棋が継いだ。
sen.e: However the biological son was only born in the year of father's death, therefore Takasada's adopted son-in-law Takayoshi, who was the third son of Okitsugu TANUMA, took over as the head of family.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処旧暦だと12月死去ですが、西暦だと1月死去となっています。父が死んだ年に、というのは旧暦で考えてのことだと思われますので、上記年月日には、括弧内で旧暦を補足しています。
sen.e: However the biological son was only born in the year of father's death, therefore Takasada's adopted son-in-law Takayoshi, who was the third son of Okitsugu TANUMA, took over as the head of family.
However the biological son was only born in the year of father's death, therefore Takasada's adopted son-in-law Takayoshi, who was the third son of Okitsugu TANUMA, took over as the head of family.
Hogo (a Buddhist name): Ungaitakamatsutakaminein.
sen.cmt: 「雲外隆松高峯院」の読みについては推測です。
sen.e: Hogo (a Buddhist name): Ungaitakamatsutakaminein.
Hogo (a Buddhist name): Ungaitakamatsutakaminein.
